channel.title: PI or Delta?
channel.description:
hey guys, i'm having a question. i'm a begining coder and i really wanna know what's the best source to start with. got some common sence like how to make a commands or add a npc, etc. but wat is the best base to start with.
P.S this server will be for my friends and other people feel like joining
(sorry for my grammer Dutch you know ;D)

item.title: PI or Delta?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“sander12346, post:19, topic:413815”]well i really don’t got a awnser so far, let’s just start off with PI.
would take me some time but it’s alright i guese?
you guys agree?[/quote]
I started with PI, I’m still using it.

Read full topic

item.title: PI or Delta?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“eballer48, post:7, topic:413815”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=515782.msg3741672#msg3741672 date=1315422694]
hyperion
[/quote]

to start out with? Are you retarded?[/quote]

We don’t need anymore shitty PI leechs on here anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: PI or Delta?
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:14, topic:413815”][quote author=Pblord7 link=topic=515782.msg3741703#msg3741703 date=1315425206]
People that say Delta sucks are just not smart enough to reprogram it.
[/quote]
You make no sense.

Why would someone re-write something that is so shitty? It wouldn’t be worth it at all. You’d be better off starting with something decent and making it good. Not starting with something horrible and making it worse (feeding the fire).[/quote]

This.

Read full topic

item.title: PI or Delta?
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:

People that say Delta sucks are just not smart enough to reprogram it.
[/quote]
You make no sense.

Why would someone re-write something that is so shitty? It wouldn’t be worth it at all. You’d be better off starting with something decent and making it good. Not starting with something horrible and making it worse (feeding the fire).[/quote]
Plus the fact that fixing a delta would take longer than it would be to just recreate the server from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: PI or Delta?
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:4, topic:413815”][quote author=I Roll Deep link=topic=515782.msg3741664#msg3741664 date=1315422172]
start with a Delta rather then with a PI, then move to something superior
[/quote]
Whoaa bro… HELL NO. Start with a Hyperion, or a PI. PI can be much more stable, if you put effort into it. My next release will be the most stable PI ever programmed. Delta looks horrible, and just is inefficient and disgusting.[/quote]
He was talking about Delta and PI. Since I don’t like these new PI servers out, loading 602s+, I’m suggesting him to use Delta. If he’s going to use the Server Download section he’ll only find the new ones.

If we are talking about something else, start with a Hyperion/RuneSource, and run it with an IDE, It will improve your coding

Read full topic
